dt: {bc}the traditional or conventional images or symbols associated with a subject and especially a religious or legendary subject
{bc}pictorial material relating to or illustrating a subject
{bc}the imagery or symbolism of a work of art, an artist, or a body of art

et: Medieval Latin {it}iconographia{/it}, from Greek {it}eikonographia{/it} sketch, description, from {it}eikonographein{/it} to describe, from {it}eikon-{/it} + {it}graphein{/it} to write {ma}{mat|carve|}{/ma}
shortdef: the traditional or conventional images or symbols associated with a subject and especially a religious or legendary subject
pictorial material relating to or illustrating a subject
the imagery or symbolism of a work of art, an artist, or a body of art
